{{ picture.id }} {{ picture.alt }} fetchUrlContent(picture.url)
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit { pictures: Picture[] = []; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService, private http: HttpClient) {} fetchUrlContent(url: string) { this.http.get(url, { responseType: 'text' }) .subscribe( data => { // Process the data here console.log(data); }, error => { // Handle any errors that occur during the request console.error(error); } ); } ngOnInit() { this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.pictures = data; }); } }
